main event: Two to three unidentified flying objects were observed in Dayton, Ohio on multiple occasions in July 1962, showing erratic movements and unusual behavior.
interesting points: The objects were tracked on ground radar as well as visually observed., Objects displayed bright, round, white lights., The objects moved at high speeds, accelerating rapidly, and altered their flight paths in irregular patterns., One witness mentioned seeing a single triangular-shaped object descending and hovering briefly before ascending., Suggestions that the objects might have been balloons or aircraft were noted, but many behaviors were still considered abnormal.
sighted object: unidentified flying objects with bright lights
witness description: Witnesses described the objects as bright and round or triangular in shape, moving quickly and making sudden maneuvers.
